items.title: ANIPLUS x hololive production Collaboration Cafe Opens in Korea From May 1st, 2025
items.author: Horii
items.content:
COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced that hololive production x ANIPLUS collaboration cafe will be opened in Korea for a limited period starting from May 1st, 2025.

The collaboration caf√© theme was previously held in the ANIPLUS caf√© in Singapore and will be revived in the ANIPLUS caf√© in Korea. The collaboration cafe will feature a collaboration menu featuring Shirakami Fubuki, Ookami Mio, Nekomata Okayu, and Inugami Korone from hololive‚Äôs unit ‚Äúhololive GAMERS‚Äù and the members of hololive 3rd generation, Usada Pekora, Shiranui Flare, Shirogane Noel, and Houshou Marine. Attendees who order the collaboration menu will receive exclusive items.

In addition, hololive production x ANIPLUS collaboration caf√© collaboration merch will be released.

ANIPLUS x hololive production Caf√©

May 1st ‚Äì June 29th

B101, Mapo Hangang PRUGIO 2nd apt. Arcade, 14 World Cup-ro 3-gil, Mapo-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea

May 1st ‚Äì June 29th

9F, 672, Jungang-daero, Busanjin-gu, Busan, Republic of Korea

May 1st ‚Äì May 28th

401~403, Cheongjeong-Building, 126, Jungang-ro, Jung-gu, Daejeon, Republic of Korea

May 1st ‚Äì June 29th

12, Chungjangnoan-gil, Dong-gu, Gwangju, Republic of Korea

ANIPLUS x hololive production Caf√© Menu

Limited Bonus for the 1st to 4th Week: Coaster & Mini holder (Random) *Limited bonus for the 5th week and onwards will be announced at a later date.

ANIPLUS x hololive production Caf√© Merch

hololive production x ANIPLUS Caf√© Merch Bonus With 20,000 KRW spent on hololive production merchandise: Sticker (random)

With 50,000 KRW spent on hololive production merchandise: Hologram Ticket (random)

With 70,000 KRW spent on hololive production merchandise: Transparent fan (random)

*Designs distributed randomly. *All premiums are available while stocks last only.

items.title: COVER Corporation Announces hololive Meet 2025 Ambassadors
items.author: Horii
items.content:
COVER Corporation announced today the five new Ambassadors for hololive Meet 2025.

Momosuzu Nene (hololive), Vestia Zeta (hololive Indonesia), Koseki Bijou (hololive English), Otonose Kanade (hololive DEV_IS), Aragami Oga (HOLOSTARS), and Octavio (HOLOSTARS English) have been appointed as hololive Meet 2025 Ambassadors, where they will be actively promoting ongoing and upcoming hololive Meet projects. There will be release of new merchandise featuring the newly appointed Ambassadors at a future date!

Comments from hololive Meet 2025 Ambassadors

‚ÄúKonNene! hololive 5th generation! The ‚ÄúN‚Äù in NePoLaBo, the energy drink for everyone‚Äôs hearts! I‚Äôm Momosuzu Nene!

Is everyone doing well?! Thank you always for your support!üíõ Thanks to everyone, I was chosen as an ambassador for 2025!‚ú® It‚Äôs all thanks to the passionate support from my overseas husbands! Let‚Äôs go and see more and more different sceneries from here on out! Nene is going to do her best to make all the Nekkos around the world happy!‚Äù

Vestia Zeta (hololive Indonesia) ‚ÄúAaa mission stato! Halooo, I‚Äôm Vestia Zeta from hololive Indonesia gen 3!

I just got a new mission to become the Hololive Meet Ambassador 2025!

Super excited to create amazing memories with you all! We do a little meeting!

SEE YOUUU! Yoroshiku ne!‚Äù

Koseki Bijou (hololive English) ‚ÄúKIRA KIRA~ KOSEKI!!!

I‚Äôm Koseki Bijou (BIBOO!) and TODAYYYYY I‚Äôm happy to say that I‚Äôm an ambassador this year for hololive Meet 2025!!

HELLO EVERYONE FROM ALL OVER THE WORLD!!! I‚Äôm so grateful for this opportunity and I can‚Äôt wait to meet you! Get ready cuz I‚Äôm taking my Biboo love to you!!

IT‚ÄôS TIME TO ROCK THE BEEP IN! :D!‚Äù

Otonose Kanade (hololive DEV_IS) ‚ÄúDo-Re-Mi-Fa-So-La-Si-Do! I am Otonose Kanade, an aspiring musician from hololive DEV_IS ReGLOSS!

Woo! I‚Äôm an ambassador for hololive Meet 2025!

Thank you to everyone around the world for supporting hololive!‚ú®

I‚Äôll do my best to make lots of fun memories!

Spread your wings and fly out into the world, hololive!‚Äù

‚ÄúHey, how are you doing?

I‚Äôm Aragami Oga from HOLOSTARS!

Thanks to all of you from all over the world for your support!

Now that I‚Äôve been chosen as an ambassador for hololive Meet 2025, I‚Äôll do my best to make all the fans around the world happy so yoroshiku!‚Äù

Octavio (HOLOSTARS ENGLISH) ‚ÄúIt is I! The one whose name starts with an O and ends with an O, my name is Octavio from Holostars English! It is my pleasure to show you around all of our Holomeet events this year. Just make sure you step out of the way when I ambassador here, and ambassador there and ambassador all over the place though! I‚Äôm looking forward to you meeting me as well! Time for me to ambassador out of here! See you when I see you!‚Äù

items.title: Kaela Kovalskia from hololive Indonesia to Reveal New Design
items.author: Horii
items.content:
Kaela Kovalskia from hololive Indonesia will reveal her new visual on her YouTube channel on March 26th, 2025 (JST).

[Kaela Kovalskia‚Äôs New Design Reveal Livestream]

We hope you take the opportunity to watch a powered-up Kaela Kovalskia with her new visual.

Click here for Kaela Kovalskia‚Äôs Talent Page.

items.title: Octopus x hololive Gen 0 Virtual Cards are Available from March 14th
items.author: Horii
items.content:
COVER Corporation has announced a new collaboration between hololive production and Octopus Card, introducing exclusive virtual card images featuring hololive Gen 0 talents. These special edition Octopus Card images are available for purchase through the ‚ÄúOctopus Card Image Store‚Äù.

As one of the most widely used smart payment systems in Hong Kong, Octopus Card will release a set of five unique virtual card images featuring Tokino Sora, Roboco-san, AZKi, Sakura Miko, and Hoshimachi Suisei. Each design features the talents in traditional Hong Kong style outfits, enjoying iconic local street food and embracing the city‚Äôs vibrant culture.

The hololive Gen 0 virtual card images will be available exclusively on the ‚ÄúOctopus Card Image Store‚Äù starting from March 14th, 2025 at HK$38 each.

During the sales period, all fans who purchase the card will automatically qualify for a giveaway event. Stay tuned to Octopus‚Äô official social media channels for details on entry requirements and giveaway announcements.

For more information, please visit the official Octopus social media accounts.

Octopus is a contactless stored value card that provides customers with a simple, safe, and secure way to pay. First launched in 1997 across public transport systems, the applications of the Octopus card have since expanded to include retail stores and various facilities, making everyday life more convenient.

items.title: hololive performs at the Final Act of ‚ÄúENTRY Inc. presents Japan Expo Paris in Osaka 2025‚Äù at the Osaka-Kansai Expo!
items.author: maki
items.content:
COVER Corp., the company behind the VTuber agency ‚Äúhololive production,‚Äù is pleased to announce that hololive will perform at ‚ÄúENTRY Inc. presents Japan Expo Paris in Osaka 2025,‚Äù held at the Osaka-Kansai Expo on April 26th (Sat) and 27th (Sun), 2025.

Confirmed as the Final Act for ‚ÄúENTRY Inc. presents Japan Expo Paris in Osaka 2025‚Äù!

Talents from hololive, hololive Indonesia, and hololive English will come together for a special showcase during the ‚Äú2nd part‚Äù on April 27th at the EXPO Arena of the Osaka-Kansai Expo. This will be a one-night-only performance that you won‚Äôt want to miss! To attend, advance reservations are required through the official Osaka-Kansai Expo website. The ‚Äú2nd part‚Äù performance will be available through a lottery system, and applications must be submitted via the Expo‚Äôs official website up to 8 days before the event.

Don‚Äôt miss this special opportunity! We look forward to your applications.

Hoshimachi Suisei, Sakura Miko, Nakiri Ayame, Oozora Subaru, Usada Pekora, Shirogane Noel, Houshou Marine, Amane Kanata, Tsunomaki Watame, Kobo Kanaeru, Mori Calliope, Shiori Novella, Koseki Bijou, Nerissa Ravencroft, Fuwawa Abyssgard, Mococo Abyssgard.

Note: Performers are subject to change without notice.

Japan Expo Paris in Osaka Information
